text: "Girls on Film" is the third single by English new wave band Duran Duran and taken from their 1981 self-titled debut studio album. It went to number 1 in Portugal, number 4 in New Zealand, number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 11 in Australia and number 16 in Ireland. There are two music videos the edited version which is very popular and the unedited version which was banned by the BBC. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Duran Duran songs Category:Girls Aloud songs
title: Girls on Film
